full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RKANG BZHI PHYUGS KYI GA-YANG 'BOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD LDAN SLOB MA 'GA' ZHIG GIS 'DI LTA BU SLAB KHO NA DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DHARMA SA MU TRA MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG BDONG GRUB PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO RNAMS DBUL PHONGS SEL RKANG BZHI PHYUGS KYIS PHYUGS PAR SHOG ,BKRA SHIS SHOG ,DGE'O, ,)
